title: Pivot app to a Bitcoin mining web dashboard (no educational/demo wording)

requirements.text: Replace the current Valentine proposal app user experience with a Bitcoin mining-themed website, removing Valentine-specific screens, components, and copy from the primary app flow (header, landing, and main content). All user-facing text must be in English and must not mention or label the site as “educational”, “demo”, “training”, “simulation”, or similar.

quotes: Create fully functional Bitcoin mining website for educational purposes but don’t mention educational or demo purpose in it please

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the app shows a Bitcoin mining-themed interface rather than Valentine proposal content (no “Valentine”, hearts, romantic proposal language, or related CTAs).
No user-facing text contains the words “educational”, “demo”, “training”, “simulation”, or equivalent phrasing.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Implement a mining dashboard UI that supports: (1) a prominent status indicator (Active/Inactive), (2) start/stop controls, (3) current hashrate display, (4) session runtime, (5) estimated earnings counters, and (6) a recent activity/events list (e.g., session started, session stopped, payout requested).

quotes: Create fully functional Bitcoin mining website...

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard provides start/stop controls and clearly indicates whether mining is active.
Dashboard displays current hashrate, runtime, estimated earnings, and a recent activity list.
UI remains usable on mobile screens (no horizontal scrolling for primary dashboard content).

requirements.text: Add a settings/configuration UI to let the signed-in user configure mining-related parameters, including at minimum: a mining profile name, a target hashrate value (numeric), a power usage value (numeric), an electricity cost value (numeric), and a Bitcoin payout address text field. Persist these settings per user so they are restored on refresh and on subsequent sign-in.

quotes: Create fully functional Bitcoin mining website...

acceptanceCriteria: User can edit and save the listed mining parameters in the UI.
After refresh, the saved settings are restored for the same signed-in user.
Settings are stored and retrieved via backend APIs (not only in localStorage) for authenticated users.

requirements.text: Extend the backend canister to store and retrieve per-caller mining configuration and mining state, including at minimum: config fields from REQ-10, whether mining is active, last start timestamp, cumulative runtime, cumulative estimated earnings, and an append-only list of mining events. Provide backend methods to (a) get current state, (b) update configuration, (c) start mining, (d) stop mining, and (e) fetch recent events.

quotes: Create fully functional Bitcoin mining website...

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes methods for getting mining state, updating config, starting, stopping, and fetching events for the current caller.
Calls are permission-gated consistently with existing access control patterns (only authorized users can read/write their own mining data).
Starting/stopping mining updates state and records corresponding events.

requirements.text: Implement a payouts/withdrawals UI flow for signed-in users that allows requesting a payout to the saved Bitcoin payout address, shows a payout history table (requested amount, address, status, timestamp), and reflects status updates stored in the backend.

quotes: Create fully functional Bitcoin mining website...

acceptanceCriteria: User can submit a payout request from the UI and it is stored in the backend.
UI displays payout history pulled from the backend.
Payout request uses the currently saved payout address by default and allows changing it before submitting.

requirements.text: Replace the existing Valentine-themed visual system (colors/tokens and imagery usage) with a coherent Bitcoin/mining-themed visual style applied consistently across the site (colors, typography, spacing, component styling).

quotes: Create fully functional Bitcoin mining website...

acceptanceCriteria: The app uses a consistent mining/Bitcoin aesthetic across header, landing/dashboard, cards, and buttons.
Valentine-specific color palette and heart/romance styling are no longer visually dominant throughout the UI.

requirements.text: Generate and include new custom static image assets for the Bitcoin mining site and render them from the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images through the backend). Update the UI to use the new assets instead of the existing Valentine images.

quotes: Create fully functional Bitcoin mining website...

acceptanceCriteria: New images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the React UI via static paths.
No UI references valentine-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png or other Valentine-generated imagery for primary backgrounds/hero sections.

constraints: Do not add any user-facing wording that describes the site as “educational”, “demo”, “training”, “simulation”, or similar.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in backend/main.mo.
Only generate backend/migration.mo if required to preserve/upgrade existing persisted state according to the conditional migration policy.

Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Do not implement hidden or non-consensual client-side CPU mining behavior; the site must not perform covert mining in the user’s browser.
nonGoals: Integrating with real Bitcoin mining hardware, mining pools, or performing actual proof-of-work mining on users’ devices or within the canister.
Third-party authentication providers (use Internet Identity only).
Real-time communication via WebSockets or push notifications.

required: Bitcoin mining hero background illustration with abstract circuitry and subtle Bitcoin motifs (mining-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Minimal icon sheet with a Bitcoin symbol, pickaxe, chip, and lightning bolt in a consistent flat style (mining-icons.dim_512x512.png)
Illustration of a mining rig (stylized ASIC rows) on a dark background (mining-rig-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)

goalsToAdd: Build a Bitcoin mining-themed web dashboard application without any educational/demo labeling in UI text.
preferencesToAdd: All user-facing text must be English and must not mention that the site is educational or a demo.
